Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27099 affecting package azure-iot-sdk-c for versions less than 2022.01.21-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27099 affecting package azure-iot-sdk-c for versions less than 2022.01.21-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package azure-iot-sdk-c is earlier than 2022.01.21-3, affected by CVE-2024-27099
